about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I’m a results-driven, passionate designer whose strength is in lateral creative thinking. I'm fascinated with technology and really enjoy figuring out faster, more innovative ways to get things done. I'm a big advocate of working smarter, not harder, and I enjoy a fast-paced, challenging environment. I work best with people in a collaborative team environment, but I'm just as happy working on my own. Plonk me in front of some creative software or give me a pencil & paper, and I'm happy. My favourite part of being a Graphic Designer is taking someone's specifications and making something out of them that looks awesome.

items.title: South Sea Cruises
items.subtitle: Graphic Designer for NZ and Fiji • January 2018 - Present
attributes: Designing assets for everything from printed marketing collateral to online assets and magazine advertisements for a range of brands including: South Sea Cruises, Day Cruises, Blue Lagoon Cruises, Awesome Adventures Fiji, Malamala Beach Club, Yasawa Islands Holidays, Vinaka Fiji Volunteering, Occasional work for other partner brands
Co-ordinating and providing finished artwork to various print companies to their print specifications
Delivering finished artwork in a range of formats to the specifications of the particular project
Setting up functional design workflows to streamline the process from brief to delivery

items.title: CBRE
items.subtitle: Marketing coordinator, Graphic Designer & Admin • March 2017 - November 2017
attributes: Maintenece and some design of branded templates
Administrative support for all the Auckland Marketing teams
Design of marketing collateral for, and helped organise corporate events
Assisted Senior Marketing Manager with the new content management system of the New Zealand website
Assisted training new members in current processes and helping to develop new ones - including designing and creating training documents

items.title: Smith & Smith Glass
items.subtitle: CSR, Admin & Booking Specialist • Febuary 2016 - March 2017
attributes: Responsible for delivering consistent Customer Delight from first contact to booking confirmation
Developed a thorough understanding a wide range of administrative and computer based systems
Scheduled bookings across over 30 Smith and Smith branches nationwide
Also required extensive knowledge of products and systems used by technicians in the field.
Research and pitch project for Environmental initiatie 'Flushwaste' came runner-up

items.title: Vinewood Motion Graphics
items.subtitle: Freelance Creative Artist & Animator • October 2015 - Febuary 2016
attributes: Worked as a freelance creative artist under creative Phil Brough
Helped out with several time-sensitive, deadline driven projects under NZME including an advertisement for AMI and several episodes of a TV series 'Cul-De-Sac'
Assissted with project pipeline management and some character rigging/animation of a short film project 'Fire In Carboard City'

items.title: Diploma of Video Post Production - Advanced
items.subtitle: Natcoll Design Technology • June 2009 - April 2010

items.title: Diploma of Film & Television Production
items.subtitle: New Zealand Broadcasting School • January 2006 - November 2007

projects.title: Ellie Earle Branding
text: This is a logo and brand I created to market myself and my skills as a designer.

projects.title: South Sea Cruises, (2018)
projects.subtitle: Printed Collateral
text: Printed collateral for various brands under the South Sea Cruises Umbrella brand.

projects.title: South Sea Cruises, (2018)
projects.subtitle: Digital and Photoshop work
text: Digital and Photoshop work I did at South Sea Cruises for online collateral.

projects.title: CBRE Event Invitations, (2017)
projects.subtitle: Design & Concept
text: These are invitations I designed for internal and external events at CBRE. The first is the 2017 CBRE Melbourne Cup,for which I presented 2 options for consideration. The second was an invitation for an internal event, Christchurch’s annual Drinks & Canapés for employees. I designed this around the style that was chosen for the Melbourne Cup Invite - a corporate, simple design that would emphasize the rough, thick texture of the card that it would be printed on.

projects.title: Motivational Quotes Posters (2017)
projects.subtitle: Branded Typography
text: This is a series of CBRE staff’s favourite work quotes, to make into motivational posters, that would be hung up around the Auckland and Christchurch offices.

projects.title: DO's and DON'T's Poster CBRE (2017)
text: This was a poster commissioned by the Christchurch office of CBRE to create a words-of-wisdom style piece to impart some selling advice for the agents.

projects.title: AECOM House Asset Management Proposal (2017)
projects.subtitle: Corporate branded document design
text: In his example, we had only 3 pages maximum to convey a large amount of fairly dry information. Instead of laying it out in sequential blocks of text, I decided to use 2 of the pages in a spread to create a flow chart which would contain most of the relevant information.

projects.title: CBRE Ceremony Event “Milestone Club” (2017)
projects.subtitle: Corporate Event Marketing Collateral
text: Below is the progression of a series of marketing collateral I designed for an award giving event at CBRE called the “Milestone Club”. This celebrated the achievements of agents from all around NZ over the past year.

projects.title: Millenials: Separating fact from fiction (2017)
projects.subtitle: Major Real-Estate Research Report Design
text: In his example, I used strategically placed stock images, typography & infographics to convey research information, a lot of which was numbers and statistics. There were also many graphs required, and I tried to vary these in style to keep it interesting.

projects.title: First Blood
projects.subtitle: Poster Concept Art
text: As a creative project for myself, I made a poster to advertise myself and my skills, based on an idiom. The one I chose was “Drawing First Blood”.

projects.title: Spank Product Design
projects.subtitle: Product concept, design, & marketing with advertsising campaign
text: Spank is a fictional aphrodisiac drink which I created a concept and marketing campaign for as part of my final project at Nacoll. I also created a set of 4 ads for the product. You can view them below.

projects.title: Showreel 2016
projects.subtitle: Production, Post-Production and 3D Design/Animation work
text: This is my showreel from a collection of works I've done from 2011-2016 while studying and after. Specifically it showcases my ability as a creature and character keyframe animator from concept/previs stage right through to completion
